author: Adam Holden
comment: Great looking watch face! Well worth the measily $1.26 asking price.

author: Pradheep Vemula
comment: The day and date dials don't work. It looks like they're just for show. The face is pretty good looking I'd give it a 4/5 if the extra dials worked.

author: Anthony Howard
comment: Had to turn my watch and phone off to get them to sync.  Looks really nice!
title: Pretty Sweet

comment: This is a really nice looking watch face :)
title: Great job!

comment: Don't waste your time on this one
